issue.title: [C++] Reintroduce DictionaryBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1882](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1882). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need the `DictionaryBuilder` to incrementally build Arrow Arrays of `DictionaryType`. The kernels only support en-bloc conversions of Arrays which yields a higher memory usage.
